column4: I was upgrading my ubuntu to 9.10 but suddently my network disconnected. How can I resume the upgrade???
restarting the upgrade and letting it calculate what it needs to download would probably be best
Idle0ne there is no upgrade button in the update manager and sudo apt-get dist-upgrade didn't work
is apt-get upgrade giving any errors?
sudo apt-get -f install didn't work as well
sure thing. let me know how it works out :)
